name: GET_ACCOUNTING_DESCRIPTION
body_snippet:
FUNCTION GET_ACCOUNTING_DESCRIPTION(STRCT NUMBER,
													i1 NUMBER,
													i2 NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
													i3 NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
													i4 NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
													i5 NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
													i6 NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
													i7 NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
													i8 NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
													i9 NUMBER DEFAULT NULL,
													i10 NUMBER DEFAULT NULL ) RETURN VARCHAR2 IS


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
------------ THIS FUNCTION RETURNS THE DESCRIPTION OF ACCOUNTING CODE

-------- PARAMETER DETAIL IS GIVEN BELLOW

-------- STRCT -> THE STRUCTURE FOR WHICH ACCOUNTING CODE DESCRIPTION IS REQUIRED
-------- I1..I10 -> IN PARAMETERS WHICH WILL ACCEPT THE IDs OF SEGMENTS VALUES
---------------------------
--- MINIMUM , THE SEGMENT 1's ID IS REQUIRED ALL OTHER SEGMENT IDs are OPTIONAL
---------------------------


    
    													
    CNT NUMBER:=0;												 
    I NUMBER;
    
    RET VARCHAR2(2048);
    VAL VARCHAR2(200);

    lvch_dep_string VARCHAR2(100);
    
    lnum_account_seg NUMBER;
    lnum_account_seg_child NUMBER;
        
BEGIN

     IF I1 IS NULL THEN RETURN(NULL); END IF;
  
     lnum_account_seg := GET_ACCOUNTING_SEGMENT(STRCT);
     
     SELECT max(SEGMENT_NO) INTO lnum_account_seg_child
     FROM WIZ_SEGMENT_DEFINITION
     WHERE STRUCTURE_ID = STRCT
     CONNECT BY DEPENDENT_ON_SEGMENT_NO   = PRIOR SEGMENT_NO AND
	               DEPENDEN
